8005.name: Press the Attack
8005.shortDesc: Hitting an enemy champion 3 consecutive times makes them vulnerable, dealing bonus damage and causing them to take more damage from all sources for 6s.

8008.name: Lethal Tempo
8008.shortDesc: 1.5s after damaging a champion gain a large amount of Attack Speed. Lethal Tempo allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.

8009.name: Presence of Mind
8009.shortDesc: Increase your mana or energy regeneration when damaging an enemy champion. Takedowns restore mana or energy.

8010.name: Conqueror
8010.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.

8014.name: Coup de Grace
8014.shortDesc: Deal more damage to low health enemy champions.

8017.name: Cut Down
8017.shortDesc: Deal more damage to champions with more max health than you.

8021.name: Fleet Footwork
8021.shortDesc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased MS.

8299.name: Last Stand
8299.shortDesc: Deal more damage to champions while you are low on health.

9101.name: Overheal
9101.shortDesc: Excess healing on you becomes a shield.

9103.name: Legend: Bloodline
9103.shortDesc: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Lifesteal. Weaker earlier but stronger later game than other Legend Runes.

9104.name: Legend: Alacrity
9104.shortDesc: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Attack Speed.

9105.name: Legend: Tenacity
9105.shortDesc: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Tenacity.

9111.name: Triumph
9111.shortDesc: Takedowns restore 12% of your missing health and grant an additional 20 gold.

8105.name: Relentless Hunter
8105.shortDesc: Unique takedowns grant permanent out of combat MS.

8106.name: Ultimate Hunter
8106.shortDesc: Unique takedowns grant permanent cooldown reduction on your Ultimate.

8112.name: Electrocute
8112.shortDesc: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.

8120.name: Ghost Poro
8120.shortDesc: When your wards expire, they leave behind a Ghost Poro. The Ghost Poro grants vision until discovered. Gain permanent AD or AP, adaptive for each Ghost Poro and when your Ghost Poro spots an enemy champion, plus bonus upon completion.

8124.name: Predator
8124.shortDesc: Add an active effect to your boots that grants a large boost of MS and causes your next attack or ability to deal bonus adaptive damage.

8126.name: Cheap Shot
8126.shortDesc: Deal bonus true damage to enemy champions with impaired movement or actions.

8128.name: Dark Harvest
8128.shortDesc: Damaging a low health champion inflicts adaptive damage and harvests a soul from the victim.

8134.name: Ingenious Hunter
8134.shortDesc: Unique takedowns grant permanent Item Haste (includes Trinkets).

8136.name: Zombie Ward
8136.shortDesc: Takedowns on enemy Wards cause friendly Zombie Wards to sprout from their corpses. Gain permanent AD or AP, adaptive for each Zombie Ward spawned plus bonus upon completion.

8138.name: Eyeball Collection
8138.shortDesc: Collect eyeballs for champion takedowns. Gain permanent AD or AP, adaptive for each eyeball plus bonus upon collection completion.

8139.name: Taste of Blood
8139.shortDesc: Heal when you damage an enemy champion.

8143.name: Sudden Impact
8143.shortDesc: Gain a burst of Lethality and Magic Penetration after using a dash, leap, blink, teleport, or when leaving stealth.

9923.name: Hail of Blades
9923.shortDesc: Gain a large amount of Attack Speed for the first 3 attacks made against enemy champions.

8210.name: Transcendence
8210.shortDesc: Gain bonuses upon reaching the following levels:Level 5: +5 Ability Haste Level 8: +5 Ability Haste Level 11: On Champion takedown, reduce the remaining cooldown of basic abilities by 20%.

8214.name: Summon Aery
8214.shortDesc: Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemies or shielding allies.

8224.name: Nullifying Orb
8224.shortDesc: Gain a magic damage shield when taken to low health by magic damage.

8226.name: Manaflow Band
8226.shortDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.

8229.name: Arcane Comet
8229.shortDesc: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a damaging comet at their location.

8230.name: Phase Rush
8230.shortDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities grants a burst of MS.

8232.name: Waterwalking
8232.shortDesc: Gain MS and AP or AD, adaptive in the river.

8233.name: Absolute Focus
8233.shortDesc: While above 70% health, gain extra adaptive damage.

8234.name: Celerity
8234.shortDesc: All Move Speed bonuses are 7% more effective on you and gain 1% Move Speed.

8236.name: Gathering Storm
8236.shortDesc: Gain increasing amounts of AD or AP, adaptive over the course of the game.

8237.name: Scorch
8237.shortDesc: Your first damaging ability hit every 10s burns champions.

8275.name: Nimbus Cloak
8275.shortDesc: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain a short Move Speed increase that allows you to pass through units.

8304.name: Magical Footwear
8304.shortDesc: You get free boots at 12 min but you cannot buy boots before then. Each takedown you get makes your boots come 45s sooner.

8306.name: Hextech Flashtraption
8306.shortDesc: While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.Hexflash: Channel, then blink to a new location.

8313.name: Perfect Timing
8313.shortDesc: Gain a free Commencing Stopwatch. After 14 minutes, it can be used for a one time Stasis effect. Each takedown you get shortens this timer by 120 seconds.

8316.name: Minion Dematerializer
8316.shortDesc: Start the game with 3 Minion Dematerializers. Killing minions with the item gives permanent bonus damage vs. that minion type.

8321.name: Future's Market
8321.shortDesc: You can enter debt to buy items.

8345.name: Biscuit Delivery
8345.shortDesc: Gain a free Biscuit every 2 min, until 6 min. Consuming or selling a Biscuit permanently increases your max mana and restores health and mana.

8351.name: Glacial Augment
8351.shortDesc: Your first attack against an enemy champion slows them (per unit cooldown). Slowing champions with active items shoots a freeze ray at them, creating a lingering slow zone.

8352.name: Time Warp Tonic
8352.shortDesc: Potions and biscuits grant some restoration immediately. Gain MS  while under their effects.

8358.name: Prototype: Omnistone
8358.shortDesc: Periodically grants a single use of another random keystone.

8360.name: Unsealed Spellbook
8360.shortDesc: Swap Summoner Spells while out of combat. Swapping to unique Summoner Spells will increase the rate at which you can make future swaps.

8410.name: Approach Velocity
8410.shortDesc: Bonus MS towards nearby enemy champions that are movement impaired, increased for enemy champions that you impair.

8242.name: Unflinching
8242.shortDesc: Gain a small amount of tenacity that increases with missing health.

8401.name: Shield Bash
8401.shortDesc: Whenever you gain a shield, your next basic attack against a champion deals bonus adaptive damage.

8429.name: Conditioning
8429.shortDesc: After 12 min gain +9 Armor and +9 Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 5%.

8437.name: Grasp of the Undying
8437.shortDesc: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.

8439.name: Aftershock
8439.shortDesc: After immobilizing an enemy champion gain defenses and later deal a burst of magic damage around you.

8444.name: Second Wind
8444.shortDesc: After taking damage from an enemy champion heal back some missing health over time.

8446.name: Demolish
8446.shortDesc: Charge up a powerful attack against a tower while near it.

8451.name: Overgrowth
8451.shortDesc: Gain permanent max health when minions or monsters die near you.

8453.name: Revitalize
8453.shortDesc: Gain 5% Heal and Shield Power.Heals and shields you cast or receive are 10% stronger on targets below 40% health.

8463.name: Font of Life
8463.shortDesc: Impairing the movement of an enemy champion marks them. Your allies heal when attacking champions you've marked.

8465.name: Guardian
8465.shortDesc: Guard allies you cast spells on and those that are very nearby. If you or a guarded ally would take damage based on level, you're both granted a shield.

8473.name: Bone Plating
8473.shortDesc: After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal 30-60 less damage.Duration: 1.5sCooldown: 45s
